name: RUN (itch) (RUNthegame)
description:
A new platformer, die and retry, runner game with randomly generated levels on your way. Be fast, jump, run and you will unlock some new content.
RUN TOWARD A BETTER YOU.
Inspired by Celeste, SMB, Dead Cells and Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures.

Stream Friendly
Demo Alpha Release

Development : Hephep
Music : Thomas Barrandon
Graphics : EncreMecanique

FIX KNOWN ISSUES :
1 : infinity Flappy Bird pattern

Windows : Clear the folder : %appdata%\Godot\app_userdata\Run
linux : Clear the folder : /home/username/.local/share/godot/app_userdata/Run

2 : Softlock at the end

Press Start then A then Start then A
